index.welcome: 這是我準備AWS考試的一個筆記，分享給同樣要準備考試或是想要重點瞭解AWS服務的大大們，有任何能補充或是該注意的地方請隨時與我連繫，感謝你的幫助！

items.name: Auto Scaling
items.intro: Auto Scaling allows you to automatically scale your Amazon EC2 capacity up or down according to conditions you define.

items.name: Elastic Load Balancing
items.intro: Elastic Load Balancing automatically distributes incoming application traffic across multiple Amazon EC2 instances.

items.name: Amazon Elastic MapReduce (EMR)
items.intro: Amazon Elastic MapReduce is a web service that enables businesses, researchers, data analysts, and developers to easily and cost-effectively process vast amounts of data.

items.name: Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
items.intro: Amazon Virtual Private Cloud (Amazon VPC) lets you provision a private, isolated section of the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Cloud where you can launch AWS resources in a virtual network that you define. With Amazon VPC, you can define a virtual network topology that closely resembles a traditional network that you might operate in your own datacenter.

items.name: Amazon Route 53
items.intro: Amazon Route 53 is a highly available and scalable Domain Name System (DNS) web service.

items.name: AWS Direct Connect
items.intro: AWS Direct Connect makes it easy to establish a dedicated network connection from your premise to AWS, which in many cases can reduce your network costs, increase bandwidth throughput, and provide a more consistent network experience than Internet-based connections.

items.name: Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3)
items.intro: Amazon Simple Storage Service provides a fully redundant data storage infrastructure for storing and retrieving any amount of data, at any time, from anywhere on the Web.

items.name: Amazon Glacier
items.intro: Amazon Glacier is an extremely low-cost storage service that provides secure and durable storage for data archiving and backup.

items.name: Amazon Elastic Block Store (EBS)
items.intro: Amazon Elastic Block Store provides block level storage volumes for use with Amazon EC2 instances. Amazon EBS volumes are off-instance storage that persists independently from the life of an instance.

items.name: AWS Import/Export
items.intro: AWS Import/Export accelerates moving large amounts of data into and out of AWS using portable storage devices for transport.

items.name: AWS Storage Gateway
items.intro: AWS Storage Gateway is a service connecting an on-premises software appliance with cloud-based storage to provide seamless and secure integration between an organization’s on-premises IT environment and AWS’s storage infrastructure.

items.name: Amazon CloudFront
items.intro: Amazon CloudFront is a web service that makes it easy to distribute content with low latency via a global network of edge locations.

items.name: Amazon Relational Database Service (RDS)
items.intro: Amazon Relational Database Service is a web service that makes it easy to set up, operate, and scale a relational database in the cloud.

items.name: Amazon DynamoDB
items.intro: Amazon DynamoDB is a fully-managed, high performance, NoSQL database service that is easy to set up, operate, and scale.

items.name: Amazon ElastiCache
items.intro: Amazon ElastiCache is a web service that makes it easy to deploy, operate, and scale an in-memory cache in the cloud.

items.name: Amazon Redshift
items.intro: Amazon Redshift is a fast and powerful, fully managed, petabyte-scale data warehouse service in the cloud. Amazon Redshift offers you fast query performance when analyzing virtually any size data set using the same SQL-based tools and business intelligence applications you use today.

showcases.name: 05 LARGE SCALE COMPUTING & HUGE DATA SETS
